text: 11.16: Kis 3.6; 3.15; Mk 12.26; FG 7.32; Fi 3.20; Hi 13.14Mbe wari won nuiana vura ndɨkndɨgi fhuvara. Zakɨra fhuvara! Mbe guigira harigi nuiana ndirgane vuzvugi. Mba nuian, ana guigira nzerigi, ana mben nuiana vura kambarigi. Mba nuian, ana Hevenan ki. Mba gumgi khaŋ Fhe Bakɨme nzuai, “Ndu nzan Fhe Bakɨme ma.” Mbe maaŋ nzuaim, Fhe Bakɨme mba kamen mberi fhu. Ne khaŋ muuŋgi, ana mbe kɨrga ŋgu bakɨme, ana ana bevahegim, ana mbur ki.
